post.text: 20 years after Donald bullied a beauty pageant winner for her weight, the real "problem" is...still Donald.

comment.author: Nicholas
comment.text: Alicia is beautiful! She has every right to feel humiliated by dumpy Trump. Trump is so insulting to women and minority's. Let's band together and vote for Hillary!

replies.author: Nicholas
replies.text: Dump Trump, vote for someone who really cares, vote Hillary!

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: Seen the interview with Miss Universe and it was clear to see she is lying.
